title: BRIEF-LHC Group Announces Completion Of Merger With Almost Family
text:
April 2, 2018 / 11:09 AM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-LHC Group Announces Completion Of Merger With Almost Family Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Lhc Group Inc - “Confident In Achieving $25 Mln In Pre : 
* LHC GROUP ANNOUNCES SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION AND EFFECTIVENESS OF MERGER WITH ALMOST FAMILY * UPDATES 2018 GUIDANCE FOR COMBINED COMPANY 
* ANNOUNCES NEW $500 MILLION SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY 
* NET SERVICE REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN A RANGE OF $1.84 BILLION TO $1.89 BILLION IN 2018 FOR COMBINED CO 
* ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN A RANGE OF $3.45 TO $3.55 IN 2018 FOR COMBINED CO 
* TAX SYNERGIES BY END OF 2019 AND LOOK FORWARD TO ADDITIONAL ACCRETION IN 2019 AND BEYOND” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
